name: Silverrun Forest AutoDrive
description:
GIANTS brand new map from the Platinum DLC - Silverrun Forest.

97 Waypoints covering Fields, Farmlands, Productions and Sell Points.

Please let us know if you find anything wrong or doesn't work and we will try and get a fix done and new version uploaded.

Please use the comments section or you can find us on Discord @ https://discord.gg/wWyH4GgpPP
